ComicInfo.Summary: Ryker has triumphed over the Hulk and spirited him away to a top-secret facility, where he's to undergo a psychological dissection! And Doc Samson, Angela and Flux are in no better shape! But will help arrive from an unexpected quarter, or will the beast at the core of Bruce Banner's mindscape break free to annihilate all?
